sentence: The lawsuit, filed by Republican Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich, alleged that Google used unfair and deceptive practices to obtain users’ location data, which it then exploits for targeted advertising.
author: BPR Wire
title: Google handed major defeat in state AG lawsuit over location tacking

sentence: The lawsuit has been assigned to U.S. District Court Judge Susan Brnovich, wife of Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich, a Senate candidate and ally of former President Donald Trump.
author: Chelsey Cox
title: Arizona GOP Chair Kelli Ward, spouse, sue to block Jan. 6 panel from accessing phone records

sentence: Justice Elena Kagan suggested to Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich, arguing for the group of states, that allowing the group to intervene in a case “that’s completely dead that never applied to you in the first place” is not the answer.
author: Jessica Gresko
title: High court wades into clash over Trump-era immigration rule
